name: Le Bouc Emissaire
description:
Controls:
AD or Left Right Arrow keys to move left and right, W/Up/Space to jump.

You can press R/O to retry if you get stuck.

Not all enemies are foreigners, there are also those from within... Traitors have slandered the noble knight and now the plague doctors want to put him in quarantine. If they catch him, the enemy will slaughter the noble knight in quarantine. 

Save the knight for king and country!

Made in ~ 12 hours.

Tools Used:

Game made in Godot, using audio made in https://beepbox.co and graphics made in https://krita.org/en/.

Font from https://www.dafont.com/old-london.font

Note About Theme:

We kind of wanted to go with something between "a lot of" and "quarantine" as that was the name of the jam. Since we were late entrants we saw the earlier submissions generally picked a theme between these and so we also tried to follow suit. You could think of it as "a lot of plague doctors are trying to quarantine you".
